### Sponsor Integration Templates

#### Host Read Template
```text
"Today's episode is brought to you by {sponsor_name}. {sponsor_description}.

{sponsor_call_to_action} Use code {discount_code} for {discount_offer}.

Thanks to {sponsor_name} for supporting independent content creation."
```

#### Product Integration Template
```text
"You know, when I'm recording for hours, I need {product_category} that {product_benefit}. That's why I use {sponsor_name}.

{sponsor_product_description}

{sponsor_call_to_action} at {sponsor_website}. Use code {discount_code} for {discount_offer}."

Thanks to {sponsor_name} for making these conversations possible."
```

### Content Strategy Templates

#### Content Calendar Template
```markdown
## {Month} Content Calendar

### Week 1 ({date_range})
- Monday: Episode promotion ({episode_number})
- Wednesday: Behind the scenes ({topic})
- Friday: Community spotlight ({fan_feature})
- Sunday: Q&A session

### Week 2 ({date_range})
- Tuesday: Tour announcement ({city})
- Thursday: Industry insights ({topic})
- Saturday: Comedy clip ({episode_number})

Platform Focus:
- Instagram: Visual-heavy content
- TikTok: Trending audio
- Twitter: Real-time engagement
- YouTube: Long-form value
```

### Crisis Management Templates

#### Issue Response Template
```text
We're aware of {issue_description} and our team is working to resolve it.

Current status: {current_status}
Expected resolution: {timeline}
Affected systems: {affected_systems}

We appreciate your patience and will provide updates as soon as they're available.

#status #update
```

#### Apology Template
```text
We sincerely apologize for {issue_description}.

What happened: {what_happened}
Impact: {impact_description}
Our commitment: {resolution_promise}

Steps we're taking:
1. {step_1}
2. {step_2}
3. {step_3}

We value your trust and will do better.
```

```html
<html>

<body>
    <div style="max-width: 600px; margin: 0 auto;">
        <h2>ğŸ™ï¸ NEW EPISODE: {title}</h2>
        
        <div style="margin: 20px 0;">
            <h3>Guest: {guest}</h3>
            <p>{episode_summary}</p>
            
            <div style="background: #f0f0f0; padding: 15px; margin: 20px 0;">
                <h4>Listen Now:</h4>
                <p><a href="{audio_link}" style="background: #007bff; color: white; padding: 10px 20px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 5px;">ğŸ§ Audio</a></p>
                <p><a href="{video_link}" style="background: #dc3545; color: white; padding: 10px 20px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 5px;">ğŸ¥ Video</a></p>
            </div>
        </div>
        
        <div style="margin: 20px 0; text-align: center;">
            <p>Follow us: {social_links}</p>
        </div>
    </div>
</body>
</html>
```

### Variable Definitions

#### Content Variables
```yaml
podcast_info:
  title: "Episode title"
  guest: "Guest name"
  guest_bio: "Brief guest bio"
  guest_hashtag: "Guest social media handle"
  episode_number: "Episode number"
  episode_quote: "Memorable quote from episode"
  topics: "Main topics discussed"
  key_topics: "Important topics for SEO"
  bullet_points: "Key takeaways in bullet points"
  episode_description: "Full episode description"
  chapters: "Timestamped chapters"
  
links:
  ep_link: "Full episode link"
  video_link: "Video platform link"
  audio_link: "Audio platform link"
  channel_link: "YouTube channel link"
  ticket_link: "Ticket sales link"
  vip_link: "VIP package link"
  
tour_info:
  tour_dates: "List of tour dates"
  date: "Specific show date"
  venue_name: "Venue name"
  venue_address: "Full venue address"
  special_guest: "Special guest for show"
  city_list: "All tour cities"
  city_hashtag: "City-specific hashtag"
  
sponsor_info:
  sponsor_name: "Sponsor company name"
  sponsor_description: "Brief sponsor description"
  sponsor_call_to_action: "Sponsor CTA"
  sponsor_product_description: "Product/service description"
  sponsor_website: "Sponsor website URL"
  discount_code: "Sponsor discount code"
  discount_offer: "Discount details"
  
technical_info:
  equipment_1: "Equipment item 1"
  equipment_2: "Equipment item 2"
  guest_details: "Guest-specific details"
  editing_details: "Editing process description"
  audio_processing: "Audio processing details"
  final_touches: "Final production touches"
  
engagement_info:
  milestone_1: "Achievement/milestone 1"
  milestone_2: "Achievement/milestone 2"
  milestone_3: "Achievement/milestone 3"
  community_highlight: "Community member feature"
  recent_episode: "Recent episode reference"
  question_1: "Fan question 1"
  question_2: "Fan question 2"
  question_3: "Fan question 3"
  
campaign_info:
  campaign_name: "Campaign name"
  campaign_description: "Campaign description"
  campaign_goals: "Campaign objectives"
  action_1: "Call to action 1"
  action_2: "Call to action 2"
  action_3: "Call to action 3"
  campaign_hashtag: "Campaign hashtag"
  campaign_duration: "Campaign timeframe"
  
crisis_info:
  issue_description: "Issue description"
  current_status: "Current resolution status"
  timeline: "Expected resolution timeline"
  affected_systems: "Affected platforms/systems"
  what_happened: "Detailed issue explanation"
  impact_description: "Impact on users"
  resolution_promise: "Commitment to resolution"
  step_1: "Resolution step 1"
  step_2: "Resolution step 2"
  step_3: "Resolution step 3"
  
newsletter_info:
  subject_line: "Email subject line"
  episode_summary: "Brief episode summary"
  social_links: "Social media platform links"
  
content_planning:
  month: "Planning month"
  date_range: "Week date range"
  topic: "Content topic"
  episode_number: "Episode to promote"
  fan_feature: "Community member to highlight"
  city: "Tour city"
  industry: "Industry focus area"
  main_topic: "Primary content focus"
```

---

## Platform-Specific Customization

### Twitter/X Customization
- **Character Limits**: Use line breaks to separate content
- **Hashtag Strategy**: 3 max, mix trending + branded
- **Media Strategy**: Always include relevant visual or link
- **Timing**: Post during peak engagement windows

### Instagram Customization
- **Visual Focus**: Always include compelling image or video
- **Story Strategy**: Use polls, questions, and behind-scenes content
- **Hashtag Strategy**: 15-30 hashtags, mix all categories
- **Engagement**: Always include clear call-to-action

### TikTok Customization
- **Audio Strategy**: Use trending sounds when possible
- **Visual Strategy**: Vertical format, text overlays for context
- **Hashtag Strategy**: 3-5 relevant, include podcast-related tags
- **Duration**: Keep content under 60 seconds for optimal reach

### YouTube Customization
- **SEO Focus**: Include keywords in title, description, tags
- **Thumbnail Strategy**: High contrast, readable text, compelling visuals
- **Chapter Markers**: Include timestamps for all segments
- **End Screens**: Promote next episode and subscribe

### LinkedIn Customization
- **Professional Tone**: Focus on industry insights and expertise
- **Content Strategy**: Longer-form, value-driven posts
- **Networking**: Tag relevant companies, industry leaders
- **Hashtag Strategy**: Industry-specific, professional tags

These templates provide a foundation for consistent, brand-aligned content across all platforms while allowing for customization based on specific needs and contexts.
